charges.charge_description: T.18;1512(b)(1) - KNOWINGLY, INTENTIONALLY AND UNLAWFULLY INTIMIDATE, THREATEN AND USE PHYSICAL FORCE AGAINST NICHELLE YVETTE LEWIS, A WITNESS, BY STRIKING HER AND KICKING HER WITH THE INTENT TO INFLUENCE, DELAY AND PREVENT HER TESTIONY IN AN OFFICIAL PROCEEDING. [ 2:02-m -557 ]
18:1512(b)(1) (18:1512B.F) TAMPERING WITH A WITNESS (date of offense concluded 8.10.02)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Per Order dated 11/22/04 120 Months Imprisonment, all other respects to remain the same as 7/29/03 Judgment Order. FORMER Sentence: 100 MONTHS IMPRISONMENT; 3 YEARS SUPERVISED RELEASE; $100.00 SPECIAL ASSESSMENT.

charges.charge_description: 18:1513(b)(2) (18:1513.F) RETALIATING AGAINST WITNESS (date of offense concluded 8.10.02)(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Per order dated 11/22/04 48 Months Imprisonment to be served consecutively with coutn 1, all other respects to remain the same as entered in 7/29/03 Judgment Order. FORMER SENTENCE: 100 MONTHS IMPRISONMENT TO RUN CONCURRENTLY WITH COUNT 1; 3 YEARS SU PERVISED RELEAS TO RUN CONCURRENTLY WITH COUNT 1; $100.00 SPECIAL ASSESSMENT.
